newsitem.title: JAPAN: Mitsubishi Motors to launch new Asia model car.
newsitem.headline: Mitsubishi Motors to launch new Asia model car.

text.p: Mitsubishi Motors Corp said on Friday that it would launch a new multipurpose model in Taiwan this autumn and later in the Philippines and Indonesia.
The Japanese firm said it had set an annual production target of 70,000 units for the new model, the Dynamic Family Wagon.

It said production of parts would be shared between Taiwan, the Philippines and Indonesia, where the firm has joint ventures. The three countries would utilise current production facilities and the project would involve new capital investment of around 17 billion yen, it said.

Mitsubishi said it had developed the new model after carrying out detailed market surveys to incorporate the needs of individual countries. It will be powered by different engines in each country and have equipment specifications tailored to local requirements.
